showerReviews.reviewText: Bathrooms are not open, there is a porta potty. There are only 2 tables. Splash pad is nice. The day we were there the park was being used for a birthday party.
Park was very clean, despite so many people visiting. It's wonderful seeing residents take pride in their park.

Great little city park. My son's team practices soccer and then a nice little play area. I gave one less star because there is an abandoned building and homeless tents are set up. The city needs to fix and abandoned building right next to kids playing area. No restrooms on site.
Nice clean friendly park

Great playground and mini water park, and they even have a grass field and baseball field. They also have an easily accessible bathroom, which is nice to have. You just have to be cautious with your belongings in this neighborhood. Overall, great park for kids to go to!

showerReviews.reviewText: truly fantastic, well policed. Something for every size child , including a ramp so they can slowly walk into the water . Clean locker rooms
Love this pool, especially the play pad for the kids.. but there’s only one thing I don’t like …some people don’t know how to clean after themselves and that can be a problem …

Wasn't crazy or very busy like I expected.  The pool was clean, so was the grassy sitting area. Brought a towel, other people had brought chairs. I guess coolers are allowed too, maybe soft ones
It was relaxing

I'm a a resident of Watervliet and the pool is the most peaceful and relaxing and clean environment I ever had the pleasure over laxing in I can't wait till next year when it's open again on the last day they had a cookout and gave us …

showerReviews.reviewText: Pool is clean, there’s a few nice, very large tables that are in the shade. The snack bar is very well priced, several bathroom stalls and showers available. It’s also nice that only residents of Waterford are allowed. It wasn’t very crowded on the 90° Saturday on 4th of July weekend. The grass area was also very clean!
Very enjoyable, hot humid day, not too crowded.  Water was clean and not cold.  Young staff maning things.  Relaxing afternoon, surprised more residents do not find it's rewards of use.

locations.title: RPI Private Robison Pool
locations.content: RPI Private Robison Pool may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I've been here for several youth club meets. The pool itself is fantastic, and the locker rooms are just fine. The parking however is confusing and overcrowded. There's some street parking, but the lots for weekend use are not well marked …
The pool was great. Very clean and big. Staff was more than respectful!

The locker room (referencing the female one) has never really been super clean, and for longer, 3 day swim meets, would not be cleaned over those days, causing it to be pretty gross. Besides that, the pool is fast and I typically PRed in these waters.
Hours can be inconsistent due to work schedule of student lifeguards. However, pool is kept clean and the lanes are quiet ! It's a great place to stay fit.
Great pool with a decent amount of parking around it on a gorgeous campus. It just needs to update the locker rooms. Really four-a-half stars.

showerReviews.reviewText: … enough lifeguards sitting under their umbrellas that can occupy the guard stand to guard the rest of the pool. So, not the best of experience if you can't even swim due to overcrowding. I'd rather stand in my shower and cool off that way.

… Amenities:  There's a small separate baby wading pool with mushroom shower feature.  There are two fun, fast and twisty waterslides for kids and adults over the height requirement, perfect for racing!   Basic snack bar should be open for …

… In addition to the main pool, there's a wading pool for the smallest kids, with a shower/fountain feature, as well as a separate area with 2 waterslides! Each area has its own lifeguards. There's a small gazebo in the waterslide enclosure, …
